```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
UHF_zipcode = read_csv("./data/appb.csv") %>% 
  slice(-43) %>% 
  select(-Borough) %>% 
  rename("UHF" = "UHF Neighborhood")
```

```{r}
data_hiv = read_csv("./data/DOHMH_HIV_AIDS_Annual_Report.csv")

data_new = full_join(UHF_zipcode, data_hiv, by = "UHF")
```
